Sign Up Today Company Overview Drive Shack Inc. is a leading owner and operator of golf-related leisure and entertainment businesses focused on bringing people together through competitive socializing. Today, our portfolio consists of: Drive Shack - Offers competitive, social entertainment through it's golf-related leisure and large-format entertainment venues with gaming and premier golf technology, a chef-inspired menu, craft cocktails, and engaging social events throughout the year American Golf - As an owner, lessee, and manager of golf courses and country clubs for over 45 years, we believe American Golf is one of the most experienced operators in the traditional golf industry Puttery - Our new, indoor entertainment golf experience expected to debut in summer 2021, with the first two venues opening in Dallas, Texas and Charlotte, North Carolina. Follow Us Drive Shack Orlando Venue Description No matter the size of your business, we offer space for up to 1,000, complimentary A/V equipment and Wi-Fi, and food perfect for all palates! Top it all off with our custom game play and signature cocktails, and we'll be the hot topic at the watercooler for months. Memorable Moment Drive Shack Orlando opened April 24, 2018, and has multiple locations in construction and development. Bash Buzz The premier golf entertainment destination! Puttery Now Hiring for its First Two Locations in The Colony/Dallas and Charlotte :: Drive Shack Inc. (DSHK) Skip to main content Skip to section navigation Skip to footer Driveshack.com Americangolf.com Puttery.com Investor Relations Investors Overview News & Events Overview Press Releases IR Calendar Email Alerts Company Info Overview Presentations Annual Reports and Proxy Statements Contacts FAQ Financial Info Overview Financial Results Income Statement Balance Sheet Cash Flow Stock Data Quote Charts Historical Data SEC Filings All SEC Filings Annual Reports Quarterly Reports Section 16 Filings Governance Overview Board of Directors Board Committees Governance Documents Driveshack.com Americangolf.com Puttery.com Press Releases Investors Investors Overview News & Events Overview Press Releases IR Calendar Email Alerts Company Info Overview Presentations Annual Reports and Proxy Statements Contacts FAQ Financial Info Overview Financial Results Income Statement Balance Sheet Cash Flow Stock Data Quote Charts Historical Data SEC Filings All SEC Filings Annual Reports Quarterly Reports Section 16 Filings Governance Overview Board of Directors Board Committees Governance Documents News & Events Overview Press Releases IR Calendar Email Alerts Puttery Now Hiring for its First Two Locations in The Colony/Dallas and Charlotte Download as PDF June 08, 2021 8:43am EDT Puttery, Drive Shack Inc‚Äôs Newest Social Entertainment Mini-Golf Experience Set to Debut Summer 2021, is Currently Hiring a Variety of Energetic, Top-Talent Hospitality Associates to Join its New and GROWING Team DALLAS--(BUSINESS WIRE)--
Drive Shack Inc. (the ‚ÄúCompany‚Äù) (NYSE: DS), a leading owner and operator of golf-related leisure and entertainment businesses, announced today that Puttery, its new social entertainment mini-golf experience, is now hiring a diverse array of energetic, top-talent hospitality team members for its first two locations in both The Colony/Dallas and Charlotte set to open Summer 2021. ‚ÄúOur teams are working hard and remain energized as we near the debut of our first two Puttery venues this summer in both Dallas and Charlotte,‚Äù said President and CEO, Hana Khouri. ‚ÄúWe are excited to begin hiring a team of fun, highly-engaged associates for our new social entertainment experience and look forward to the talent and energy they will bring to Puttery and the guest experience.‚Äù With an adult-focused and modern spin on the classic game of mini-golf, Puttery combines thematic design elements and state-of-the-art auto-scoring technology to create a truly immersive, high-definition experience for guests. Anchored by multiple bars and lounges, Puttery will be the first ‚Äì and natural ‚Äì choice for going out and having a great time. Puttery will feature an upscale food and beverage menu ‚Äì specially curated by its own chefs and craft-spirits specialists. Available positions in The Colony/Dallas Puttery location include bartenders, servers, concierge hosts, line cooks, dishwashers and many more. Positions currently being hired in the Charlotte Puttery location comprise several key management roles, including Bar Manager, Front of House Manager, Executive Chef, Sous Chef and Director of Sales, to name a few. Come join our GROWING team and help make Puttery the ultimate destination for food, drinks and fun. The new 22,000 square-foot Puttery venue in Dallas is located at 5762 Grandscape Boulevard, The Colony, Texas. The new 18,000 square-foot Puttery venue in Charlotte, North Carolina is located at 210 Rampart Street. Interested candidates for both locations can complete an online application at www.puttery.com and finalists will participate in virtual and/or in-person interviews, which will follow all Covid-19 safety protocols and procedures. Puttery associates will receive discounted game play, food and beverage discounts, plus the opportunity to obtain medical benefits, participate in a 401(k) retirement savings plan, receive vacation benefits and much more. For more information about working at Puttery, please visit www.puttery.com . About Drive Shack Inc. Drive Shack Inc. is a leading owner and operator of golf-related leisure and entertainment businesses. Drive Shack Inc. Company Overview, Contact Details & Competitors | LeadIQ Learn more at LeadIQ.com Start free Insights Similar companies Tech Stack Media & News Email Format FAQ Insights Expanding Entertainment Portfolio Drive Shack's recent launch of the Puttery mini-golf concept and new locations in Minneapolis and Houston indicates a growth strategy focused on diversifying their entertainment offerings, creating opportunities for suppliers of themed attractions, interactive tech, and event services. Technological Innovation With state-of-the-art technology like custom drives and competitive socializing experiences, Drive Shack shows a commitment to innovative entertainment solutions, presenting opportunities to provide advanced tech equipment, digital engagement tools, and related software solutions. Financial Growth Potential Having generated revenue between $100 million and $1 billion and securing a recent $26.5 million loan, Drive Shack is positioned for expansion and capital investments, making it a promising target for financing, equipment leasing, or strategic partnerships. Market Expansion Strategy The company's ongoing development of new venues across multiple markets demonstrates an aggressive expansion plan, offering opportunities for real estate, construction, and venue management services to support their growth. Competitive Industry Position As a significant player competing with brands like Topgolf and BigShots Golf, Drive Shack's focus on innovative, tech-driven entertainment experiences indicates a potential for collaboration with technology providers, event organizers, and hospitality partners to enhance customer engagement and differentiated offerings. In 2021, Dallas-based Drive Shack launched its own mini-golf concept, Puttery, with its first-ever location at Grandscape. Dec 07, 2023 | dallasinnovates.com Drive Shack Inc. opened new location in Minneapolis, Minnesota, United States on Jul 18th '23. Drive Shack Inc., an owner and operator of golf-related leisure and entertainment businesses, will open Puttery Minneapolis this Friday, July 21. Jul 19, 2023 | rebusinessonline.com Drive Shack Inc. receives financing of $26.5M in term loan facility. Drive Shack Inc. announces $26.5 million term loan facility. Mar 07, 2023 | ir.driveshack.com BigShots Golf, LLC identified as competitor of Drive Shack Inc. on Apr 13th '22. More than two years after the initial decision to proceed and the filing of plans, construction will finally begin this month in Akron on BigShots Golf, a tech√¢¬Ä¬êdriven golf entertainment venue that competes with Topgolf and Drive Shack, to replace The Range at Firestone 9. (the "Company") (NYSE:DS), a leading owner and operator of golf-related leisure and entertainment businesses, today announced plans to bring Puttery, its newest competitive socializing experience, to Pittsburgh√¢¬Ä¬ôs popular Strip District. Feb 22, 2022 | finance.yahoo.com Drive Shack Inc. launched Puttery location in Houston on Aug 9th '21. Development continues with its Charlotte, DC and Miami venues and, earlier this morning, Drive Shack announced its newest Puttery location in Houston, its fifth market nationwide. Entertainment Providers United States 1001-5000 Employees Experience a refreshing alternative to traditional entertainment at Drive Shack. We're not just another venue; we're a destination where you can truly be yourself, let loose, and create unforgettable memories. Our state-of-the-art technology, diverse entertainment options, and chef-inspired menu ensure every moment spent with us is remarkable. Whether you're a seasoned golfer or a first-time player, our driving range and large-format entertainment options cater to all ages and skill levels. From corporate events to family outings, Drive Shack offers customizable event spaces for any occasion. Come and create memories that last a lifetime with us. Today, our portfolio consists of: Drive Shack - Offers competitive, social entertainment through it's golf-related leisure and large-format entertainment venues with gaming and premier golf technology, a chef-inspired menu, craft cocktails, and engaging social events throughout the year American Golf - As an owner, lessee, and manager of golf courses and country clubs for over 45 years, we believe American Golf is one of the most experienced operators in the traditional golf industry Puttery - Our new, indoor entertainment golf experience expected to debut in summer 2021, with the first two venues opening in Dallas, Texas and Charlotte, North Carolina.
